item.description:
Most of us are just like Thomas A. Anderson/Neo, the main character in the movie The Matrix, young human beings living a double life. One life is like Thomas, a computer programmer spending the week in a repetitive reality of waking, working, eating, and then retiring, while the other life is spent as Neo, a computer hacker searching for life’s biggest answers, “What is the Matrix?”

Later Neo is given a choice between the blue pill, the ignorance of normal reality, or the red pill, embracing the truth behind the hidden levels of reality. Neo chooses the red pill and is opened to the reality of a world where anything is possible as long as you believe it to be true.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=te6qG4yn-Ps

Today neurobiologist and quantum physics are shaping a higher level of understanding “Reality.”

Simply stated, “Every person creates his or her own reality and experiences it subjectively.”

We will explore:

  • Define: The Divine Matrix
  • Discuss the Mystery that Connects all Things
  • Begin to see How the Devine Matrix Works

Join us for an evening of learning more about what make the Law of Attraction work.

Facts will be taken from Gregg Braden’s book The Divine Matrix: Bridging Time, Space, Miracles, and Belief.


We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Understanding LOA via The Matrix
